Package cafe

Class Order

java.lang.Object
cafe.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
This is the order class to create an instance of order and to store list of menu items
Author:
Dhvani Kakabalia, Kuhu Halder
